charges.charge_description: UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, knowingly did possess in and affecting commerce, a firearm and ammunition, that is, a Taurus.38 caliber pistol, and.38 caliber ammunition, all of which had been shipped and transported in interstate and foreign commerce; in violation of Title 18, U.S.C., Sections 922(g)(1), 924(a)(2) and 924(e). (1)

UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, knowingly did possess in and affecting commerce, a firearm and ammunition, that is, a Bersa.45 caliber pistol, and.45 caliber ammunition, all of which had been shipped and transported in interstate and foreign commerce; in violation of Title 18, U.S.C., Sections 922(g)(1), 924(a)(2) and 924(e). (2)
